translation.en: [Elle] Well, after graduation,
Noah, Lee, Rachel and I decided to take one week and go on a road trip,
translation.zh:
‎我、诺亚、李尔和瑞秋
‎决定进行为期一周的公路旅行

translation.en: just the four of us.
And while I was busy putting off the inevitable decision
translation.zh:
‎在此期间 我一直拖着
‎在录取我的两所大学间做决定

translation.en: between the two colleges where I got accepted…
[Lee] So, what about you?
I-- I got wait-listed.
Both Berkeley and Harvard.
translation.zh: ‎伯克利和哈佛的候补名单上都有我

translation.en: I was fully focused on making sure we all had as much fun as possible.
translation.zh: ‎我全心全意确保大家都玩得尽兴

translation.en: -[shouts] -[Elle] And that's exactly what we did.
Let me run you through the highlights.
On our way up to Northern California, we camped in the woods.
translation.zh:
‎在去北加利福尼亚的路上
‎我们在树林里露营

translation.en: -[Lee] Hey! -[Elle] Went fishing on a lake.
translation.zh:
‎在去北加利福尼亚的路上
‎我们在树林里露营 ‎在湖上钓鱼

translation.en: Fed some wildlife, caught some waves at Big Sur.
translation.zh: ‎投喂野生动物 ‎在大苏尔划水追浪

translation.en: Watched Noah becoming friends with Rachel.
Watched Lee watch Noah becoming friends with Rachel.
translation.zh: ‎看着李看着诺亚和瑞秋成为朋友

translation.en: Watched a shooting star with someone special. Oh, my God!
Saw the fish at the aquarium in Monterey.
Saw a sunset with colors I had never seen before.
translation.zh: ‎看到了我从未见过的斑斓日落

translation.en: And got a reminder about rule number 19. [sighs]
Decided to think about it later.
-Drove to San Francisco. -[bell ringing]
Went to Fisherman's Wharf.
-Ate clam chowder out of a bread bowl. -[all chattering]
-[Elle] Watched the sea lions on Pier 39. -[animals bark]
Watched our naughty video from chemistry lab.
translation.zh: ‎看了我们在化学实验室的黄色小视频

translation.en: [chuckles] Destroyed our naughty video from chemistry lab.
translation.zh: ‎销毁了在化学实验室的黄色小视频

translation.en: -Rode tandem bikes in Golden Gate Park. -[laughing]
[Elle] Rode a speedboat in the bay.
-Caught a movie. -[laughing]
-Caught a concert. -[cheering]
[Elle] Even caught a baseball in a kayak outside Oracle Park…
translation.zh:
‎甚至还在甲骨文球场外的皮划艇上
‎接到了棒球

translation.en: -[Lee] It's coming! -I got it! [gasps]
-Whoa. -[Lee] Whoa!
-[stadium fans cheering] -Oh, my God!
Oh, my God!
But the absolute best was watching the Bay Lights
translation.zh:
‎但最棒的部分是
‎和世界上我最爱的两个人

translation.en: with my favorite two guys in the world.
But when you decide to escape reality,
you know that eventually you're gonna have to come back to it.
translation.zh: ‎你心里明白最终还是要回归现实

translation.en: So, when we got back home,
I got a job so I could make some money for college,
translation.zh:
‎我找了份工作
‎这样我就可以赚点上大学的费用

translation.en: whichever one I wind up going to.
Oh, hey, guys…
But as hard as that was for me to decide,
a few days later, things got even more complicated
translation.zh:
‎但几天后
‎诺亚问了一个非常意外的问题

translation.en: when Noah asked a very unexpected question…
So, anyway, I was thinking, uh…
when you get off the wait-list for Harvard, maybe you and I
could go off-campus and get an apartment together.
translation.zh: ‎也许我们可以不住学校 ‎一起租个公寓

translation.en: Wait. You mean, like… like, get our own place?
translation.zh: ‎等等 你是说我们自己找地方住？

translation.en: Yeah, look. [clears throat]
I've been online all day. There's some pretty cool places.
translation.zh:
‎我在网上看一天了
‎有一些挺好的房子

translation.en: What?
-You wanna live with me? -No.
[laughs] Yes, of course I wanna live with you. I wanna do everything with you.
translation.zh:
‎我当然想和你一起住了
‎我什么事都想和你一起做

translation.en: -Really? -Yes, really.
-How long do we have till Lee gets back? -I don't know.
Geronimo!
-No, no, no, no, no, no! [screams] -[Noah] Oh, shit!
-Hey, guys. Look what I got. -Ooh!
translation.zh: ‎朋友们 看我拿来了什么

translation.en: -Thank you. -You're welcome.
[Elle] Oh, boy.
Is everything okay?
Yeah, fine.
-Um, in fact… -Hmm.
-Yes, I would like that very much. -Yeah, I thought you might.
-See you. -Where are you two going?
Hmm. Noah wants to read me poetry and tell me all about his feelings.
translation.zh:
‎诺亚想给我读诗
‎讲一讲他的理解和感悟…

translation.en: -Really? Is that what you wanna go with? -[clattering]
-[laughing] -[Lee] Smooth move!
Oh, I wanted to show this to you.
[Rachel] What is it?
I have painstakingly coordinated my Berkeley schedule
translation.zh:
‎我煞费苦心地
‎把我在伯克利大学的课程安排

translation.en: with your Rhode Island School of Design schedule.
translation.zh:
‎和你在罗德岛设计学院的课程安排
‎协调起来

translation.en: -[Rachel] Aww. -First up, we've got Labor Day.
I know it's early in the semester, but it's a long weekend,
translation.zh: ‎我知道是学期初 但这是个长周末

translation.en: and I'm pretty damn sure I'm gonna be having my Rachel withdrawals.
translation.zh: ‎我非常确定我会超级想念我的瑞秋

translation.en: That could work.
Of course it'll work. We'll make it work.
translation.zh: ‎肯定可以的 我们一定会做到的

translation.en: [Rachel] Okay.
This place is so nice. Thank you for bringing us here.
translation.zh:
‎这个地方真不错
‎谢谢你们带我们过来

translation.en: Well, we wanted to finally take you somewhere special
translation.zh: ‎毕竟想带你们去一个特别的地方

translation.en: to help celebrate your graduation.
So, any big plans for the summer?
Well, actually, now that you mention it,
we were all talking about heading over to the beach house this weekend,
translation.zh: ‎我们正讨论这周去海边别墅玩儿

translation.en: if that's cool.
Is everything okay?
Yeah, everything's fine. Um, we just have some news for you.
translation.zh:
‎一切都好
‎我们只是有些消息要告诉你们

translation.en: We are planning to sell the beach house.
[all] What?!
It doesn't make sense to hold on to it anymore.
translation.zh: ‎再留着这房子没有任何意义了

translation.en: Now that you kids are going off to college.
You know, the upkeep on the place is hardly worth it since we're not even gonna be there.
translation.zh:
‎因为我们根本不会去那里
‎所以不值得进行维修保养

translation.en: Truth is the whole area is being redeveloped.
translation.zh: ‎其实整个地区正在重新开发

translation.en: You know what you sound like, Mom? You sound like a realtor.
translation.zh:
‎你知道你这口吻像什么吗 妈？
‎像房地产经纪人

translation.en: That's because I am a realtor.
translation.zh: ‎那是因为我就是房地产经纪人

translation.en: Wait, so where are we gonna watch the fireworks on the Fourth of July?
translation.zh:
‎等等 那我们国庆节
‎要去哪里看烟火？

translation.en: No, I'm sorry. I'm putting my foot down. You guys are not selling.
translation.zh: ‎不行 我坚决反对 你们不能卖

translation.en: I gotta go with Lee on this one.
This house has been in our family for, like, 80 years.
You can't just get rid of it like that.
Is this a vote? Because I vote "no."
I'm sorry, guys.
It's been decided.
I'll be right back.
-Hello? -[exhales]
Miss Evans, this is Don Washington from UC Berkeley's admissions.
translation.zh:
‎埃文斯小姐 我是加大伯克利分校
‎招生处的唐 · 华盛顿

translation.en: I'm following up on your decision regarding Berkeley.
translation.zh:
‎我在跟进你关于
‎是否选择伯克利分校的决定

translation.en: Uh, yes. Hi.
Um, is there any way I could just get another small extension?
I'm very sorry, Miss Evans,
but we need your decision by end of business day tomorrow.
translation.zh:
‎但我们需要您
‎在明天工作日结束前做出决定

translation.en: [Elle] I knew that I couldn't hide from it any longer.
Uh, okay. I understand.
-Thank you. -[Don] All right.
[Elle] The next day, I had to pick a school
translation.zh: ‎明天 我必须选择一个学校

translation.en: and make one of my two favorite people very unhappy.
translation.zh: ‎让我最爱的两个人中的其中之一伤心

translation.en: I'ma hit you with a "draw four," "draw two." Uno, Uno out.
translation.zh:
‎我要对你用“罚牌2张”、“罚牌4张”
‎乌诺 我赢了

translation.en: -[Mr. Evans] Oh, no! -What? Gosh!
Let's go. [grunts]
-Did he cheat? -[Brad] Unh-unh.
-[laughing] -Aww. I miss this. I feel like I barely see you guys anymore.
translation.zh:
‎我好怀念这种感觉
‎我都很少见到你们了

translation.en: Yeah, I know.
-They're keeping you busy at work. -Very busy.
But don't worry, I'm still good to babysit tomorrow.
translation.zh: ‎但别担心 我明天还是可以当保姆的

translation.en: Do you think you're gonna be working a lot of weekends with this new job?
translation.zh:
‎你觉得这份新工作
‎会老让你周末加班吗？

translation.en: Uh, yeah, looks that way.
Uh, but I'm not working tomorrow night.
I got a date.
[Elle] A date?
-Really? -Yeah.
Um, how many dates have you been on with this mystery person?
translation.zh: ‎对 ‎你和这位神秘女士约会多少次了？

translation.en: A few. Her name is Linda.
Interesting.
Well, obviously, we,
Brad, are gonna have to give you a curfew, young man.
translation.zh: ‎我们要给你设个宵禁时间了 年轻人

translation.en: -Okay. Understood, ma'am. -[both laugh]
[Elle] The next day, we all drove down to the beach house
translation.zh: ‎第二天 我们一起驱车前往海边小屋

translation.en: to do something I never thought I'd have to do.
translation.zh: ‎去做一件我从未想过自己会去做的事

translation.en: Help the Flynns get ready to sell it.
translation.zh: ‎那就是帮弗林一家收拾准备做卖房子

translation.en: I had spent literally every summer of my childhood
hanging out here with Lee and Noah.
translation.zh: ‎都跟李尔和诺亚一起在这里度过

translation.en: And the idea this would be our last summer here together
translation.zh:
‎一想到这将是我们在这里共度的
‎最后一个暑假

translation.en: was just hitting me.
[sighs] I was really gonna miss this old place
translation.zh: ‎我真的会很想念这个老地方

translation.en: in ways I hadn't even realized yet.
translation.zh: ‎以现在甚至还未意识到的方式

translation.en: -I'm so sorry. -No, no, no, don't worry about it.
It's always been like that.
-Oh. -Oh, man.
This is funny. Elle and I, we used to pretend this was a diamond.
translation.zh:
‎可有意思了 我和艾莉
‎以前总假装这是一个钻石

translation.en: -[laughs] -And we would, like, pretend to steal it.
It was like this big jewel heist.
Look how young we all were.
[Lee] What's weird is it doesn't feel like all that long ago to me.
translation.zh: ‎奇怪的是 我不觉得是很久以前的事

translation.en: You should keep that one. Mom would like that.
translation.zh: ‎你该留着这张照片 妈妈会很欣慰的

translation.en: Maybe I will.
Hey, we were thinking about ordering a pizza.
translation.zh: ‎嘿 我们正想着订个披萨

translation.en: -Does that sound good? -Yes, absolutely.
In the meantime, could you get started packing up the rumpus room?
translation.zh:
‎趁等披萨的时候
‎你们可以开始收拾娱乐室吗？

translation.en: -Yes. -Yeah, all right.
[Lee] Come on.
-Whoa! -[toy squeaks]
[sighs] Okey dokey. Here's what we should do.
We need to make one pile for the stuff we wanna keep
translation.zh: ‎我们要把想要保留的东西放一堆

translation.en: and then another pile for things we wanna put in bags and donate.
translation.zh:
‎然后把想要装袋
‎和捐赠的东西放另一堆

translation.en: -[rock music playing] -♪ It's time to work… ♪
[groans] I wanna keep that one. Yep.
Yep.
-Nope. -[Lee] Yep.
-Oh, you cheater! -Oh!
-[Elle] Well, that was productive. -[laughing]
Wait. Oh, my God! I just remembered something.
translation.zh: ‎等等！天呐 我刚想起一件事

translation.en: -Oh, my God. It's still here! -[gasps] Our Mario Kart lunch box!
translation.zh: ‎天呐 这个还在这儿！ ‎我们的马里奥赛车午餐盒！

translation.en: What?! Oh, my…
No!
Wait. Is that what I think it is?
translation.zh: ‎等等 这是我想的那个吗？

translation.en: -It's our beach bucket list! -What?
Oh, my God!
A long time ago,
Lee and I put together a list of all the crazy things we wanted to do together
translation.zh:
‎李尔和我列了一张清单
‎写了上大学前我们想一起做的

translation.en: before going to college.
It was all of our childhood summertime dreams and fantasies
translation.zh: ‎这是我们童年夏天的所有梦想和幻想

translation.en: listed out on one very important piece of paper.
translation.zh: ‎我们列在了一张非常重要的纸上

translation.en: -Damn. We put together a solid list. -Yeah, we did.
translation.zh:
‎-牛啊 我们列了份相当厉害的清单
‎-没错

translation.en: -We could get arrested for that one. -[laughing]
translation.zh: ‎我们可能会因为那件事被捕

translation.en: -Uh, yeah, no, uh, we actually could. -Wow!
So, how long does it usually take to sell a house out here?
translation.zh: ‎在这边卖房子一般要花多久？

translation.en: Well, we have to put it on the market,
but, you know, maybe two or three months.
That's gonna be a real hassle running out here all the time, though.
translation.zh: ‎不过要一直跑来这里还挺麻烦的

translation.en: What do you mean?
Well, we have to meet with the appraisers,
surveyors, contractors and the people looking to buy the place.
translation.zh: ‎测量师、承包商 还有意向买家

translation.en: Well, gee, that does sound like a real hassle.
translation.zh: ‎哎呀 那听起来真是挺麻烦的

translation.en: Yeah, especially, you know, with all the road work that's coming up.
translation.zh: ‎是啊 尤其过一阵还有道路施工

translation.en: I mean that traffic on the freeway, back and forth and back and forth and back and forth.
translation.zh:
‎高速公路上那些来来回回的车流
‎真的是…

translation.en: [Elle] Not to mention all that cleaning.
And constantly driving up to check on the work that's being done.
translation.zh: ‎还要经常开车来检查工作进度

translation.en: Okay, what are you kids getting at?
I am so glad that you asked, dear parent of mine.
Since this is our last summer here at the beach house,
translation.zh:
‎既然这是我们
‎在海边别墅的最后一个夏天

translation.en: and since, like you said, you're gonna need someone here, help coordinating some stuff.
translation.zh:
‎既然你们需要有人在这里
‎帮忙协调一些事情

translation.en: We would be more than happy to stay here for you.
translation.zh: ‎我们很乐意替你们待在这里

translation.en: But we would take amazing care of the place.
translation.zh: ‎但我们绝对会好好收拾这房子的

translation.en: So, what do you say?
-We'll talk about it. -[gasps] That's a yes! Ha ha ha!
translation.zh:
‎-我们商量商量
‎-那就是同意了

translation.en: [Elle] Wait. Not so fast, man. Not so fast. Deal isn't closed yet.
translation.zh: ‎等等 别急着高兴哥们 还没定论呢

translation.en: Guys.
Come on.
-Okay. -Yes! Yes!
But this place needs to be absolutely spotless.
-I mean it. -Well, yeah, yeah. Of course.
It shall be done. Your wish is our command.
translation.zh: ‎我们会做到的 悉听尊便

translation.en: -[Mrs. Flynn] Okay. -[Lee] I love you.
translation.zh:
‎-好
‎-我爱你 我跟你说过吗？

translation.en: -Have I told you told that recently? -I'll be right back.
translation.zh:
‎-好
‎-我爱你 我跟你说过吗？ ‎我马上回来

translation.en: [Lee] Not a worry in the world. We got you, Ma. You're the best.
translation.zh: ‎完全不用担心 有我们呢妈 你最好了

translation.en: [man] Admissions. Berkeley.
Hi. Uh, this is Elle Evans. I'm--
translation.zh: ‎您好 我是艾莉·埃文斯 我…

translation.en: Yeah, yeah, that's right.
Yeah, I'm just calling to let you know that I've-- I've made a decision.
translation.zh: ‎对 我打来就是告诉您我做好决定了

translation.en: Hey, can I talk to you for a second?
-Yeah. -Okay.
What's going on?
I got off the wait-list.
Harvard.
-What? Ha ha! -Ooh!
Wait, wait. Stop, stop, stop. Put me down. Put me down.
translation.zh: ‎等等 住手 放我下来

translation.en: Oh, shit.
Crap.
Hang on.
Lee!
Lee!
Lee, can we please talk?
What's there to talk about? You know, this is just the way things go, right?
translation.zh:
‎有什么好谈？
‎事情就是会这样 对吧？

translation.en: No, what-- what do you mean?
It's just the way the world works, you know. Friends leave. They grow apart.
translation.zh: ‎总是这个样子 好友离去 渐行渐远

translation.en: We are-- we're gonna talk every single day, and I will see you on holidays.
translation.zh: ‎我们每天都会聊天 放假也会见面

translation.en: No, because I'm gonna-- gonna be with Rachel on holidays.
translation.zh: ‎不会 因为假期我会和瑞秋在一起

translation.en: Okay, yeah, that's-- that's fine.
But like you told her, we're gonna make it work too.
translation.zh:
‎但就像你跟她说的
‎我们也会努力使之可行

translation.en: And come on, dude. We just-- we landed a beach house, right?
translation.zh:
‎拜托 朋友 我们刚才还说…
‎要一起待在海边别墅 对吧？

translation.en: We can make this summer a blast.
translation.zh: ‎我们这个暑假可以过得很嗨

translation.en: -I promise. -Yeah.
Kind of like you promised about rule number 19?
translation.zh: ‎就像你保证过要遵守第19条规则？

translation.en: That is not fair.
I can't just not be upset about this, Elle.
translation.zh: ‎我不可能对这件事一笑了之 艾莉

translation.en: Okay, you're leaving me.
[Elle] I felt horrible about hiding all this from Lee.
translation.zh: ‎对李尔隐瞒了这一切 我感觉很糟糕

translation.en: But the truth was I was leaving him,
translation.zh: ‎但事实确实是我要离开他了

translation.en: no matter how much I wanted to be at Berkeley with him too.
translation.zh: ‎不管我多么想和他一起去伯克利

translation.en: And it was killing me to see him so upset.
translation.zh: ‎看到他这么沮丧 我心里难受极了

translation.en: All I wanted to do
was show him how much he meant to me.
Lee,
I don't know what's gonna happen.
But what I do know is that no matter where we are,
translation.zh: ‎但我知道 无论我们身在何处

translation.en: you're always gonna be my best friend.
translation.zh: ‎你永远都会是我最好的朋友

translation.en: And I just happen
to be holding some list
translation.zh:
‎我刚好拿着一张清单 ‎上面列着我们可以让这个夏天
‎成为我们最棒的一个夏天

translation.en: that says we could make this our best summer yet.
translation.zh:
‎上面列着我们可以让这个夏天
‎成为我们最棒的一个夏天

translation.en: So, you're saying…
that we do this whole list this summer.
translation.zh: ‎今年夏天我们一起完成整个清单

translation.en: Our best summer we've ever had.
The best summer ever. Period.
I promise.
I mean, rule number 18.
[sighs] Yeah.
You got into Harvard.
I got into freaking Harvard. [chuckles]
Congratulations.
[Elle] It was our last summer together…
translation.zh: ‎这是我们最后一个相伴的暑假

translation.en: And I was gonna make it count.
The whole summer?
I promise I can still be here whenever you need me to babysit,
translation.zh:
‎我保证不管什么时候
‎你需要我照看孩子我都会在

translation.en: so you could hang out with, you know, uh, what's-her-name.
-Linda. -Right. Linda.
But seriously, Dad, I'll take care of everything, okay?
translation.zh:
‎但说真的 爸爸
‎我会处理好一切的 好吗？

translation.en: Things will be handled, all right?
Milk will be bought, soccer will be played.
translation.zh: ‎我会买好牛奶 足球训练也不耽误

translation.en: All chores will be done. I swear.
translation.zh: ‎还会做好所有家务活 我发誓

translation.en: Brad has to be picked up from soccer on Thursdays.
translation.zh: ‎每周四要去足球场接布莱德

translation.en: I'm on call every other weekend.
So, is that a yes?
-That is a yes, Ellie-bear. -[shouts]
Yes! Thank you! Thank you, thank you, thank you.
This is so awesome.
-Got a really good feeling about this. -[Lee shouts]
♪ Some people only talk about it… ♪
[Elle] Move over.
Sorry. Wrong number.
-[honking horn] -Yo, dude! What's up?
-Oh, my! -[Lee] Oh, man!
To the last and best summer at the beach house.
translation.zh:
‎敬在海边别墅度过的
‎最后也是最美好的夏天

translation.en: -Yeah! -Cheers.
Oh, I just wanna let you know
I might have invited a few people over tonight, you know, to celebrate.
translation.zh: ‎我可能邀请了几个人来一起庆祝

translation.en: How few?
Hey, bitches!
Hey, girl!
Come in!
Elle, this place is killer.
We thought you were poor. [laughs]
-Oh, well-- -Is that not crazy?
-That is crazy! -[Gwyneth] Oh, my God!
-Okay, we'll see you later. Bye. -See you, guys.
translation.zh:
‎-一会见 拜拜
‎-好 姐妹们

translation.en: This is our next door neighbor. Ashton.
translation.zh: ‎嘿 这是我们的邻居 阿什顿

translation.en: -Hi! Welcome. -Hi.
-Are you a Berkeley guy? -Yeah, just finished my first year.
translation.zh:
‎-你是在伯克利上学吗？
‎-对 刚上完大一

translation.en: Dude, I start in the fall.
Get out of here, man.
[Lee] Wait. I've got a million questions. Can we chat?
translation.zh: ‎等等 我有大一堆问题 能聊会吗？

translation.en: -Absolutely. Fire away, man. -Yes! Sick.
translation.zh:
‎-没问题 随便问
‎-好！太棒了

translation.en: [Elle] Seems like a nice new friend.
[Elle] Actually, it was nice to know that Lee would have a friend when he got to Berkeley.
translation.zh:
‎我很高兴知道
‎李尔在伯克利能有个朋友

translation.en: And I take it you're a Spider-Man fan too.
I don't know. Does driving 600 miles
to find a copy of Amazing Spider-Man #3 make me a fan?
translation.zh:
‎去找一本《超凡蜘蛛侠3》原稿
‎算不算粉丝？

translation.en: [laughs] That's another thing. Oh, man. This is crazy.
translation.zh: ‎还有这种事 天呐 太疯狂了

translation.en: [Elle] But I have to say,
it felt a little weird when I realized that friend wasn't gonna be me.
translation.zh:
‎当我意识到那个朋友
‎不会是我的时候感觉有点奇怪

translation.en: You know what? I got-- I got an idea.
To the, uh, last summer at the beach house.
translation.zh: ‎敬在海边别墅度过的最后一个夏天

translation.en: [Lee] And the best summer ever! Period!
translation.zh:
‎还有迄今为止最棒的夏天！
‎就是这样！

translation.en: [Elle] Like I said,
gonna make it count.
Good morning. It is one o'clock in the afternoon, sunshine.
translation.zh: ‎早上好 ‎现在是下午1点了 睡美人

translation.en: -[groans] -Sports drink and aspirin to your left.
translation.zh: ‎运动饮料和阿司匹林在你左边

translation.en: Oh, yes, please.
Well, come on. Aren't you gonna ask me why I woke you up?
translation.zh: ‎拜托 你不问我为什么叫醒你吗？

translation.en: -Why the hell did you wake me up? -Oh, my God. I thought you'd never ask.
translation.zh:
‎-你为什么要叫醒我？
‎-天呐 我还以为你不会问呢

translation.en: Well, Lee Flynn,
as promised, our bucket list.
translation.zh: ‎正如我们说好的 完成愿望单

translation.en: I have carefully planned and very intricately scheduled each item
translation.zh:
‎我费尽心思地仔细计划
‎和安排了每一个项目

translation.en: to make sure we soak in all of its summery goodness.
translation.zh: ‎以确保我们完美体验夏日美好

translation.en: Here we go.
-[man] One, two, three! -["Good Lovin'" playing]
♪ Good love, good love! ♪
♪ Good love ♪
-[Elle] Go! -[both slurping]
-Oh! -Oh, God!
[Elle] Yeah!
Geronimo!
Oh, my God! Here we go!
-[man over PA] Ready? Go! -[crowd cheering]
-[man] We got a winner! -[cheering]
translation.zh: ‎胜负已定！ ‎（赢得吃派大赛冠军）

translation.en: [Elle] Hey, babe.
No! No!
-This is the best day of my life! -[laughing]
translation.zh: ‎这是我人生中最美好的一天！

translation.en: [Noah] I'm literally gonna murder you!
-To making… -[both] Dreams come true!
-[Lee] Oh, my God! -[shouting]
Ladies and gentlemen, we have a winner.
translation.zh: ‎女生们、先生们 冠军诞生了

translation.en: -Yeah! -[cheering]
-♪ Yeah, yeah, yeah! ♪ -♪ Yeah, yeah… ♪
-This is amazing. -You've done this before.
-I swear to you. I've not. -No.
-Oh, I'm done! -Yes!
-Hey, Noah! What day is it? -Sunday.
translation.zh:
‎-喂 诺亚！今天星期几啊？
‎-星期日

translation.en: -What day? -Sunday!
[both] Oh, okay.
[Elle] We got him!
-This is the first time this has happened. -What?
[both] Hey!
-[growls] -[screaming]
[Elle groans] Bucket list.
[Noah] Yo! You're gonna be late for work.
Lee.
-Hey, May. -You don't work here. Stop sweeping.
translation.zh:
‎-嘿 梅
‎-你不在这里工作 别扫了

translation.en: -[Lee] But there's sand everywhere. -Oh, sweet boy.
translation.zh:
‎-但这到处都是沙子
‎-小伙子真好

translation.en: -Hey, Elle. -Yeah.
So I have you working a double today.
And then I put you down for those extra shifts you wanted.
translation.zh: ‎然后我安排你之前提过的额外轮班

translation.en: -Extra shifts? -Mm-hmm.
Uh, okay.
Is there a problem?
No, no, it's no problem. Thanks, May.
translation.zh: ‎不 没问题 谢谢你 梅

translation.en: -Thank you. -Okay.
[Elle] Yeah. No problem at all.
[Elle] Hey, that's my job.
-Dude! [chuckles] -Are you kidding? I just wanna help.
You know, we're not gonna be able to do all of our bucket list items.
translation.zh: ‎我们无法完成所有愿望单的项目

translation.en: [Elle] Bucket list item number 22.
Live together at Berkeley.
[sighs] This one was gonna be tricky.
Hey, um…
I've been thinking. And what if I just went up with you now?
translation.zh: ‎我一直在想 如果我现在跟你去呢？

translation.en: Yeah, we go up to Berkeley. We'll find an apartment, get set up.
translation.zh: ‎我们去伯克利大学找个公寓收拾收拾

translation.en: It'll be like we're moving in together without the actual, you know, moving in part.
translation.zh:
‎这样我们就算住在一起了
‎还不用真的搬家

translation.en: -I accept your offer. -Ooh, yay!
Hi, guys. Sorry about the wait. I--
translation.zh: ‎各位 抱歉等久了 我…

translation.en: -Elle? -Oh, my God.
-[chuckles] -Uh, hi.
-[splutters] How are you? -[chuckles]
-Oh, my God. It's so good to see you. -Elle, nice to see you.
translation.zh:
‎-很高兴见到你
‎-嘿 艾莉 很高兴见到你

translation.en: -Hey. -Hi.
Um, I haven't seen you since graduation.
W-what are you doing here?
Well, we were hungry.
That makes sense. You are here, and you are hungry.
translation.zh: ‎没错 你们过来因为你们饿了

translation.en: [chuckles] Um, of course. What can I get you? Do you wanna go first?
translation.zh: ‎当然 你们要点什么？你想先点吗？

translation.en: I've got some recommendations for you.
-Hey. -Hey.
Sorry for the weirdness earlier.
translation.zh: ‎我之前表现得很奇怪 抱歉

translation.en: [chuckles] Oh, gosh. Don't worry about it.
I hope things can be cool for us,
since we'll probably run into each other around here.
translation.zh: ‎因为我们可能会在这里经常碰到对方

translation.en: Of course it can. Yeah.
Um, are you hanging out at the beach this summer?
Yeah, I just got a job lifeguarding at the water park.
translation.zh:
‎对 我在水上乐园当救生员
‎刚应聘上的

translation.en: Oh, cool. Wait, wait, wait. Is that the one with the giant go-kart track?
translation.zh:
‎挺好 等等 是那个有
‎大型卡丁车赛道的水上乐园吗？

translation.en: That is the one.
Interesting.
Um, question…
Hey.
Hey, loser. What you up to?
translation.zh: ‎喂 小蠢蛋 你干嘛呢？

translation.en: [clicks tongue] Uh, just doing some apartment hunting.
Good. Your last place smelled like weird old cheese. [laughs]
translation.zh:
‎挺好 你上一个住所
‎闻着一股奇怪的臭芝士味儿

translation.en: Okay, so listen.
The fam are gonna be in LA earlier than I thought.
translation.zh: ‎我们一家要比我想象的早到洛杉矶了

translation.en: Oh, that's great. You should come by our place for a bit.
translation.zh: ‎太好了 到我这里来玩吧

translation.en: -Come crash if you want. -Are you sure Elle won't mind?
translation.zh:
‎-如果你愿意 可以住几天
‎-艾莉不会介意？

translation.en: Maybe you should ask her first.
No, it's okay. We're in a pretty good place right now.
translation.zh: ‎不用 没事的 我们现在感情挺稳定的

translation.en: I think it'll be good.
Cool, cool, cool. You think you can pick me up when I get in?
translation.zh: ‎行 那我到了 你能接我吗？

translation.en: -Yeah, of course. -Perfect. I'll text you the address.
translation.zh:
‎-当然
‎-太好了 到时候给你发地址

translation.en: Okay, bye.
That's why it's so funny.
Actually, um, you rushed out of the house so-- so quickly this afternoon.
translation.zh: ‎今天下午你一下子就冲出门了

translation.en: I didn't-- I didn't get a chance to ask you. I--
I'm sorry. I've had, like, a million things going on.
translation.zh: ‎对不起 有超多事情要做

translation.en: But, um, ask me what?
Well, Chloe's actually gonna be in town,
and I told her it would maybe be cool if she wanted to stay at our place for a bit.
translation.zh:
‎我跟她说如果她想的话
‎可以在我们家住一段时间

translation.en: Is that okay with you?
Yeah. Oh, my gosh. Yeah, absolutely.
translation.zh: ‎可以 天呐 当然没问题

translation.en: As far as I'm concerned, that is-- that's ancient history.
And she can come with us to the-- the water park.
translation.zh: ‎而且她可以跟我们一起去水上乐园玩

translation.en: What's the water park?
Okay, so, totally random.
I ran into Marco and his family eating at the restaurant,
translation.zh: ‎我遇见马可和他家人在餐厅吃饭了

translation.en: and he actually has a job at the water park.
So he's gonna help us with this cool bucket list thingy.
translation.zh: ‎所以他会帮我们完成愿望单的事

translation.en: Oh, cool. Marco.
Wait, that's--
That's kind of a double standard. I was totally fine with Chloe.
translation.zh:
‎你这是双重标准吧？
‎克洛依的事我都能够接受

translation.en: Well, I didn't kiss Chloe.
I didn't mean for that to come out the way that it did. I'm-- I'm really sorry.
translation.zh: ‎我不是故意那样表现的 真的很抱歉

translation.en: It's okay.
Let's just drop it, okay?
Okay, it's dropped. [chuckles]
[Elle] Okay.
-[Noah] I'm bored. -[both laugh]
So you'll-- you'll come to the water park?
-Yeah, yeah, I'll come. -Okay.
And since you're going,
you can help Lee and I with a bucket list item.
translation.zh: ‎你可以帮我和李尔完成一条愿望清单

translation.en: Oh, God. What-- what is it?
What is the bucket list item?
-It's amazing. -[chuckles] No.
-I'll let Lee fill you in. -No.
And that's our epic plan for race day.
translation.zh: ‎这就是我们赛车日的宏伟计划

translation.en: So, will you help us?
Absolutely not.
-Why the hell not? -Look, Lee, I'm not gonna wear a costume.
translation.zh:
‎-为什么啊？
‎-听着 李尔 我不会穿那套衣服的

translation.en: I'll go, be there for Elle…
[chuckles] and whatever this, uh, little mission is that you got going, but, uh, that is it.
translation.zh: ‎不管你要完成什么小心愿 我意已决

translation.en: You know, if you spent less time worrying about your bucket list,
translation.zh: ‎如果你少花点时间想着愿望单

translation.en: you might be able to get that taillight fixed.
I like it busted! And screw you!
What?
Did you really expect him to do it?
Well, yeah, I thought that, you know, maybe this time he would actually--
translation.zh: ‎对啊 我想也许这次他真的会…

translation.en: -[sighs] No, no, not really. -[chuckles]
Well, hey, anyway,
I just wanna let you know how much fun it is having you here while I'm working.
translation.zh:
‎我想让你知道我在工作的时候
‎有你陪着我真的很开心

translation.en: -But I do have one question. -What's that?
What does a girl gotta do to get water on table 17?
translation.zh: ‎17号桌的女孩要的水怎么还不上？

translation.en: -Chop, chop! -Yes, ma'am. I'm on it.
translation.zh:
‎-快点快点
‎-好的 女士 马上去

translation.en: -[laughing] -Hey, Lee. [Lee] Hey!
-You ready to go? -[Lee] Definitely.
Ready to go where?
I, uh, invited Ashton to go to the, uh, the comic book show.
Cool.
You didn't wanna go to that, did you? I could stay here if you need me to.
translation.zh:
‎你不想去的 对吗？
‎如果你需要我我就留在这里

translation.en: No, no. Gosh, no. I-- I gotta--
[chuckles] Gotta work, so…
-I catch you later? -Catch you later!
Was I a total hypocrite or what?
Bye. Have fun.
This was my fault, after all.
I was the one leaving Lee.
But even though I wanted to be with Noah so badly,
I couldn't help wondering if I should've chosen Berkeley
translation.zh: ‎我忍不住想是不是应该选择和李尔

translation.en: with Lee instead.
-Hey! What are you doing here? -Hey!
Wanted to stop by and say I got everything set up for you at the water park.
translation.zh:
‎就是顺道过来跟你说
‎水上乐园的一切都安排好了

translation.en: -No way! Oh, my God! Thank you so much. -[chuckles]
translation.zh: ‎不是吧！天呐 太感谢你了

translation.en: No worries.
Is Noah helping out too?
[exhales] You know, typical Noah.
We couldn't get him to wear the costume, but he'll be there.
translation.zh:
‎我们没办法让他穿上戏服
‎但他会去的

translation.en: Is he gonna have any problem with me being there?
No, no, no. It'll be totally fine. Don't worry.
translation.zh: ‎不会 完全没问题 别担心

translation.en: Hey! What's up, handsome? Come on.
Are you sure you wanna stay at my place? This is like a really freakin' nice boat.
translation.zh:
‎你确定要住在我家吗？
‎因为这艘船也太豪华了

translation.en: [laughs] Okay, listen. The problem is my dad actually thinks he can drive it.
translation.zh:
‎好吧 是这样
‎问题是我爸真的以为他会开船

translation.en: -[door slams shut] -[man] I'm tired of being told I'm a liar.
translation.zh: ‎我受够了被人说我是个骗子

translation.en: [woman] Oh, my God, Ron! Do you ever listen? That is not what I said.
translation.zh:
‎天呐 罗恩 你有没有听我说话？
‎我没有那么说

translation.en: Oh, yeah, and also, there's that.
Please. You gotta get me the eff out of here, dude. [chuckles]
translation.zh: ‎拜托 你必须带我逃离这里 老兄

translation.en: -Hey, Dad. What's up? -Hey. Hi, honey.
translation.zh:
‎-喂 爸爸 怎么了？
‎-喂 宝贝

translation.en: Uh, listen. Brad's sitter just canceled.
translation.zh: ‎是这样 布莱德的保姆来不了了

translation.en: I'm really gonna need a hand with him tonight.
translation.zh: ‎今晚我真的需要有人帮忙照顾他

translation.en: Um, okay. Yeah, that's…
I promised Chloe and Noah we can hang out after work,
translation.zh: ‎我答应克洛依和诺亚下班后一起玩了

translation.en: but I didn't wanna let Dad down either.
So…
-Hey, dude. -Yo.
[Elle] …I knew I'd have to get creative.
I have a question.
What do you think about coming down to the beach house
and spending the night with us?
You can bring Mario Kart. I'll teach you the ramp jump.
translation.zh:
‎你可以带上《马里奥赛车》
‎我教你跳斜坡

translation.en: -[gasps] I think I'll go get my stuff. -Great!
Awesome. Do you want some nachos before we go?
translation.zh: ‎太棒了 走之前想吃点玉米片吗？

translation.en: -[Brad] No, Linda already made me some. -Linda?
translation.zh:
‎-不用了 琳达给我做了一些吃
‎-琳达？

translation.en: -[Linda] So sorry. -That's okay.
[gasps] Here, here. Let me fix that.
-[Elle] No, no, I got it. I got it. -Oh.
-[Elle] Okay. -Okay.
Well, uh, wine disaster aside, I'm really glad to meet you.
translation.zh: ‎先不说葡萄酒灾难 ‎见到你真的很高兴

translation.en: [chuckles] -Uh, yeah. You too.
I'm really glad you're here.
Your dad and I were wondering if you could have dinner with us soon.
translation.zh:
‎我和你爸爸在想
‎你是否愿意和我们一起吃晚餐

translation.en: Um, you know, I would love to,
but the restaurant has me working such crazy hours lately.
Um, I-- I think I'm gonna have to pass on that.
Okay.
Well, your mom was an old friend of mine.
It'd be nice to talk about her with you, but maybe we could do something else.
translation.zh:
‎能和你谈谈她真好
‎但也许我们可以做点别的

translation.en: Yeah, maybe. Um, I-- I--
But I'm-- I'm kind of in a rush, so I gotta get going.
translation.zh: ‎但是我有点赶时间 所以我得走了

translation.en: It was nice to meet you.
No, you too.
Uh, Brad, I'll be in the car.
-Bye. -Bye.
-[Chloe] Come on, come on, come on. -[Elle] Chloe!
-Seriously? -I'm sorry. I'm sorry.
-This is ridiculous. No, no, no, no! -[laughs] I'm in.
-Aww. No! -I'm sorry.
-Wow! -[both laugh]
-Well, remind me never to play you again. -[laughs] Oh!
translation.zh:
‎-提醒我再也不和你玩了
‎-哎呀

translation.en: Maybe you should have skipped this college thing.
You know, go pro.
Oh, my gosh. I'm not that good, but thank you.
translation.zh: ‎天呐 我还没那么厉害 还是谢谢你

translation.en: -[Chloe laughs] -[both shout]
Oh, my God. Your brother is adorable.
Yeah, he's pretty cool.
Yeah, just, um, babysitting, 'cause my dad is on a date…
translation.zh:
‎就是我照顾他
‎是因为我爸爸跟人约会…

translation.en: Okay.
…with his new, uh, girlfriend or whatever he's calling her. I don't know.
translation.zh:
‎跟他新女朋友的约会
‎不管是什么吧 我也不知道

translation.en: I just met her. She's kind of annoying.
translation.zh: ‎我刚还见到她 她有点惹人厌

translation.en: -No. -Yeah.
Well, if it makes you feel any better,
all my friends hate their dad's girlfriends.
translation.zh: ‎我所有朋友都讨厌自己爸爸的女朋友

translation.en: Oh, well, I don't really, like-- I don't really hate her.
Don't worry about it, okay? I promise you, it's pretty standard.
translation.zh:
‎不用多想 好吗？
‎我向你保证 大家都是这样

translation.en: [Lee] Everybody was wishing they were dressed up like us.
translation.zh: ‎每个人都希望自己穿得像我们一样

translation.en: What's great was all the looks were out of pure jealousy.
translation.zh: ‎他们脸上都是嫉妒 太爽了

translation.en: -They wished they looked as cool as us. -Yeah, yeah.
translation.zh:
‎-嘿 各位
‎-他们希望像我们一样酷

translation.en: Where have you been?
When was the last time you checked your phone?
Why? Didn't you go to the-- the comic book thingy?
translation.zh: ‎怎么了？你们不是去看漫画了吗？

translation.en: [both chuckle] She called it a thingy.
-I got this. -All right.
So, yeah, we did end up going to the comic book show.
translation.zh: ‎没错 我们确实去漫展了

translation.en: But then after that, we went up to meet with our friend Elle
translation.zh:
‎但是在那之后
‎我们去见了我们的朋友 艾莉

translation.en: for bucket list item number 18.
translation.zh: ‎一起完成了愿望清单的第18条

translation.en: '80s mini-golf night.
Oh, my God! No.
-Yes! And it was spectacular. -Out of this world.
translation.zh:
‎-没错 而且过得非常精彩
‎-人间绝妙

translation.en: -[Lee] And Ashton got three holes in one. -That's cool.
translation.zh:
‎-阿什顿一杆进了三个洞
‎-太厉害了

translation.en: No. I-- I just…
Anyway, I'm really sorry, Lee.
Are you mad at me?
No, as long as we're still good for tomorrow.
translation.zh: ‎没事 只要明天按计划进行就行

translation.en: -Yeah, come on. Prepped and ready to go. -Cool. Also, Ashton's gonna come too.
translation.zh: ‎那肯定的 一切都准备就绪了 ‎好 对了 阿什顿也去

translation.en: [laughs] Yay! So fun.
-[grunts] -Let's go!
All right, come on, let's go.
♪ Hope this feeling lasts forever… ♪
It's time.
[both shout] Yeah!
What exactly are they gonna do?
It's so stupid. I told her I'm not doing it.
[scoffs] You can be so stubborn.
-Yes. -Sometimes you gotta support your lady.
translation.zh:
‎-对
‎-有时候你得支持你的女人

translation.en: I am. I'm here. I'm supporting her.
translation.zh: ‎我支持啊 我在这就是支持她

translation.en: That's if she ever shows up.
[gasps] Oh, she showed up.
-She definitely showed up. -[both laugh]
[woman] Oh, my God!
They've been waiting their whole lives for this. [laughs]
translation.zh: ‎他们一辈子都在等待这一刻

translation.en: Wario!
[woman] Marco!
Oh, my God. It's Marco!
-Wario! -[Elle laughs]
-You are my hero. -[laughing]
Gimme a helmet.
[announcer over PA] Ladies and gentlemen,
start your engines.
You ready, princess?
Affirmative, Plunger-One. We are go for race day.
translation.zh: ‎准备好了 一号管道工 向赛车日进发

translation.en: All right.
Okay, Melvin. You're my eyes in the sky.
translation.zh: ‎好了 梅尔文 你是我的侦查之眼

translation.en: [Melvin] I got you, Elle.
-You're going down! -[boy] Yeah!
[announcer] And they're off!
-[shouts] -I'm pulling up tight, baby. Ha ha ha!
[Elle] All right, you two. It's go time!
translation.zh: ‎好了两位朋友 是时候了！

translation.en: -[Lee] Line up. -[Elle] Don't let them through.
[Lee] Don't open up any gaps. Okay? Keep it closed.
translation.zh: ‎一点空都不要留 好吗？保持紧凑

translation.en: [Elle] We got 'em locked in with this trio, baby!
translation.zh: ‎我们三人组让他们无路可走了

translation.en: Oh, come on! Cheater!
[Melvin] Good job, Elle. No one's getting through.
translation.zh: ‎好样的 艾莉 没人能过去

translation.en: -Yahoo! Mario is number one. -I'm coming for you, Evans.
translation.zh:
‎-马里奥是第一名
‎-我来找你了 埃文斯

translation.en: [Elle] Hope you're hungry.
[Vivian] Bloody hell!
-Sorry, Viv! -Oh, this is great.
translation.zh:
‎-该死！
‎-抱歉 薇薇 ‎太好玩了

translation.en: Nice lap, Elle.
Watch your back, Chloe!
-Can a lady get through here? -[Elle] You got this, princess.
translation.zh:
‎-能不能让女士通过一下？
‎-交给你了 碧姬公主

translation.en: -[Lee] I'm on it! -[Randy] Out of my way, Chloe!
[Chloe] Oh, here we go!
No! [grunts]
-[laughs] -Gonna have to try harder than that. -[shouts] -[laughing]
-Hey, Melvin. How we looking? -Uh, mostly clear, Elle.
translation.zh:
‎-嘿 梅尔文 现在状况如何？
‎-基本还行 艾莉

translation.en: But Noah's trying to get through.
[Elle] Keep in formation, ladies.
-[Lee chuckles] Let him have it. -[Elle] Your turn, Luigi.
translation.zh:
‎-给他点颜色看看
‎-该你上了 路易吉

translation.en: -[shouting] -[Elle] Whoa! Good throw, man!
Whoa!
-[Elle] Oh, my God! -[gasping]
-[announcer] Marco's out of the race. -[laughs]
-Whoa! -[cheering]
[announcer] And now he's back!
Go, Marco. Go!
Whoa! [shouting]
-I got you, Evans. -I don't think so.
translation.zh:
‎-我来追你了 埃文斯
‎-你想得美

translation.en: -[Lee] Oh, my God! -[Ollie grunts]
She slimed me! I can't see! -[shouts] -[crowd gasping]
-Gotcha! -That was amazing!
Oh, Elle!
-Oh, no. -[Rachel laughing]
-[Lee] No! -[Elle shouts] There can only be one!
[laughs] You got me! [Melvin] Okay, guys, coming up on your final lap.
translation.zh:
‎-你打到我了
‎-好了各位 就剩最后一圈了

translation.en: -Hey, pretty boy. What are you doing? -Winning.
translation.zh: ‎喂 帅哥 你要干什么？ ‎我要赢

translation.en: -[Lee] You are dead meat. -[shouts]
-[Rachel] Lee! -[Lee] Sorry, Rach.
[announcer] Rachel's out! And now there's an opening.
translation.zh: ‎瑞秋出局了 现在有了空缺

translation.en: -Whoa! -[announcer] Marco and Noah are through.
[Elle] Melvin, what's going on?
Marco and Noah are going at it pretty hard.
Uh, Noah.
Noah, can you hear me?
Noah!
-[announcer] Noah is pulling ahead. -[metal scraping]
-Now, it's Marco. They're neck-and-neck. -[shouts]
translation.zh: ‎现在是马可领先‎ ‎他们不分上下

translation.en: -Yeah! -[cheering]
[announcer] Marco wins!
[Elle] Oh, boy.
That was incredible.
-[chattering] -What? Oh, it's glorious.
-[Elle whoops] That was insane! -[man] Oh, my God, guys, that was insane!
Hey, can you hold this for a sec?
Yeah.
Close one.
-Is everything okay? -Yeah, everything's okay.
Come on.
-Don't be mad just 'cause you lost. -You know what I keep thinking about?
translation.zh: ‎别因为输了就生气 ‎你知道我一直在想什么吗？

translation.en: Why the guy that you kissed in front of the whole world
translation.zh: ‎那个你当着全世界接吻的人

translation.en: is wearing the costume that you asked me to wear.
translation.zh: ‎为什么穿着原本你让我穿的服装？

translation.en: -Noah! You blow things out of proportion. -Why's he wearing it?
translation.zh:
‎-诺亚！你太小题大做了
‎-他为什么穿着那衣服？

translation.en: It's very clear that he's still after you--
He's not. There's nothing going on between Marco and me.
translation.zh: ‎他没有…我俩之间什么事都没有

translation.en: If you think that he's not still after you, then you're being naive.
translation.zh:
‎如果你觉得他没在追你
‎那你就太幼稚了

translation.en: It's embarrassing.
It's embarrassing.
God. I'll see you at the house.
Hey, thank you so much again for today. It was amazing.
translation.zh: ‎嘿 今天真的很谢谢你 太精彩了

translation.en: Of course. Any time.
You're the best.
[Lee] Sounds like Noah was pretty upset.
You know what?
I don't even care. What we just did was legendary.
translation.zh:
‎我根本不在乎
‎我们刚刚做的事太帅了

translation.en: I don't know. I sort of think he might have a point.
What?
Listen, I just don't think I would be too happy
if Rachel started hanging out with an ex of hers all the time, you know?
translation.zh:
‎开始老是和她一个前任待在一起
‎我也会不高兴 你知道吧？

translation.en: Okay. First off, he's not my ex, Lee.
translation.zh: ‎行了 首先他不是我的前任 李尔

translation.en: And second, it takes two people to do something.
translation.zh: ‎再说了 一个巴掌根本拍不响

translation.en: Which means Noah doesn't trust me.
It's him that I don't trust.
I mean, he clearly still has feelings for her. So…
translation.zh: ‎我是说 他显然对她还有感情 所以…

translation.en: Look, if you trust her, then you gotta believe what she says and nothing less.
translation.zh:
‎听着 如果你信任她
‎你就必须相信她说的一切

translation.en: Is everything okay?
Uh, yeah. It's just-- just stuff with my parents.
What's going on?
It's nothing.
My dad just told me that him and my mom are getting a divorce,
translation.zh: ‎我爸刚跟我说他要和我妈离婚了

translation.en: and now they won't stop calling to check up on me.
translation.zh: ‎现在他们不停打电话问我情况…

translation.en: -Oh, I'm sorry. -No, please.
translation.zh:
‎-我很遗憾 我真的…
‎-真的不用

translation.en: Just don't make a big deal about it, okay?
[sighs] Eight ball, corner pocket.
-Third time's the charm. -Third time.
It's always the third time. What's that about?
translation.zh: ‎总是第三次才成功 是为什么啊？

translation.en: What is that?
[Lee] What? Wait a minute.
What?
No way.
I cannot believe they're getting rid of our DDM machine.
translation.zh:
‎我真不敢相信他们要扔掉
‎我们的舞蹈狂热终极对决跳舞机

translation.en: Wait. The DDM machine.
translation.zh: ‎等等 舞蹈狂热终极对决

translation.en: What are you doing?
I'm adding a final item to our list.
translation.zh: ‎我要在清单上加上最后一个项目

translation.en: The last DDM dance on our machine.
translation.zh: ‎在我们的跳舞机上跳最后一支舞

translation.en: July 5th. You'll be there, right?
translation.zh: ‎7月5日 你会去的 对吧？

translation.en: [Elle] I don't know if it was the fight with Noah
translation.zh: ‎我不知道是不是和诺亚吵架的原因

translation.en: or that everyone seemed to be coming at me at once,
translation.zh:
‎还是因为
‎每个人似乎都突然给我好多压力

translation.en: but I was starting to feel overwhelmed.
-What? You don't wanna do it? -Of course I wanna do it.
translation.zh: ‎怎么？你不想做这件事吗？ ‎我当然想做

translation.en: But we literally have one month left to finish the entire bucket list,
translation.zh:
‎但我们只剩下一个月
‎去完成整个愿望单了

translation.en: and then we leave for school.
Yeah.
I get it.
You got your hands full. It's okay.
-[Elle] But just like Lee… -[sighs]
Lee, hold on please.
I'll be there.
…I wasn't ready to let go yet either.
Okay. Thanks.
And we're still on for tonight? All right, we put a lot of work in it.
translation.zh: ‎今晚还按原计划进行？ ‎我费了好大功夫 我们不能迟到

translation.en: -So we can't be late. -Yeah, no, don't worry. I won't be late.
translation.zh: ‎我费了好大功夫 我们不能迟到 ‎好 别担心 我不会迟到的

translation.en: Noah, you did all of this?
translation.zh: ‎诺亚 这一切都是你做的？

translation.en: I wanted to make up for yesterday.
This looks amazing.
I thought you could use a night in. You deserve it.
translation.zh:
‎我觉得你可以在家安心待一晚
‎这是你应得的

translation.en: What's wrong?
Well, there's this…
God. I have this thing with Lee, and it's like we've been planning it for weeks--
translation.zh:
‎我和李尔约好了
‎我们已经计划好几周了…

translation.en: Please don't tell me it's a bucket list thing.
translation.zh: ‎别跟我说又是愿望清单的事

translation.en: I'm sorry. I feel horrible.
You're actually gonna go? I mean, I made you dinner.
translation.zh: ‎你真要去？可是我给你做了晚餐

translation.en: -I did this for you, and you're leaving? -No, it's not like I wanna go.
translation.zh:
‎-我为你做了这一切 你却要走？
‎-又不是我想走 诺亚

translation.en: Listen, we're gonna be in Boston together all next year.
translation.zh: ‎我们明年一整年都会一起在波士顿

translation.en: I just feel like I'm leaving him all alone.
Me asking you to come to Boston
isn't some, like, evil plot to make you leave Lee behind.
translation.zh: ‎并不是让你离开李尔的什么阴谋

translation.en: No, I-- I'm not-- That's not what I'm saying at all.
translation.zh: ‎不 我不是…我根本不是这个意思

translation.en: Listen, I'm gonna be back in an hour, okay? I swear.
translation.zh: ‎听着我一小时后就回来好吗？我发誓

translation.en: Fine. Do whatever you want.
Noah. I-- [sighs]
Please.
I'm sorry. I…
[Lee] Hey, you okay?
[Elle] Yeah, of course.
-[Rachel] Mm-hmm. -Sure.
♪ I said you're holding back She said shut up and dance with me ♪
-Yeah! -Yeah!
Oh, my God!
-That was crazy, right? -[woman] That was crazy!
[Elle] The truth was, I was doing the bucket list to soften the blow to Lee
translation.zh:
‎事实是 完成愿望清单这件事
‎是为了让李尔不那么难过

translation.en: so it would be easier to go to Boston with Noah.
translation.zh: ‎这样和诺亚一起去波士顿会更容易些

translation.en: But every step closer we got to finishing the list…
translation.zh: ‎但当我们离完成清单越来越近…

translation.en: Noah?
…made me feel like I was one step further away from him.
You awake?
Hey, whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa! What are you doing?
I'm painting the trim.
Okay, well, you can paint everything else in this house, just not this doorway.
translation.zh:
‎这房子任何地方你都能刷
‎就是不能刷这个门框

translation.en: Well, Mom told me to do it, so…
I don't care what Mom said. You're not painting this doorway.
translation.zh:
‎我不管妈妈说什么
‎你不能刷这个门框

translation.en: -Stop being a jerk, man. Just move. -I'm not moving!
translation.zh:
‎-别这么不懂事 走开
‎-我不走

translation.en: Fine.
You're gonna have to sleep at some point.
Brad!
Brad!
Brad!
-Brad? -[Brad] Yeah.
Thank God.
Where were you, dude? I couldn't find you anywhere.
translation.zh: ‎你去哪了？我到处都找不到你

translation.en: I'm right here.
Well, yeah, but I was supposed to come get you.
translation.zh: ‎对 但我本来是去接你的

translation.en: Hey, Elle. I wasn't expecting you. Can I get you a plate?
translation.zh: ‎嘿 艾莉 我没想到你会来 ‎给你拿个盘子吧？

translation.en: What?
No, no, I'm here because I was supposed to get Brad, and I couldn't find him.
translation.zh:
‎不用 我在这里是因为我本来要去
‎接布莱德的 但我找不到他

translation.en: Oh, Elle, I'm so sorry.
Your dad told me how busy you were, and I offered to pick up Brad.
translation.zh:
‎你爸爸告诉我你特别忙
‎我就主动请缨去接布莱德

translation.en: Oh, didn't he text you?
No, he didn't. [huffs]
What I would like, though, is for you to contact me directly
translation.zh: ‎不过如果计划有变 我希望你可以

translation.en: if plans change.
I really am sorry.
But with you working and grocery shopping and watching Brad,
translation.zh:
‎但你又要工作又要买菜
‎还要照顾布莱德

translation.en: I just felt like you might need a hand.
Well, you were wrong.
We've been taking care of ourselves quite fine for a while now.
translation.zh: ‎我们自力更生有一段时间了

translation.en: Milk was bought.
-[groans, gulps] -Are you okay?
[Elle] Just not this week.
-Can I do anything? -Mnh-mnh.
[gulps] Nope. I got it covered.
How much longer on table 25?
[man] Just hold your horses.
-[shoes squeak] -Whoa! [grunts]
-[clattering] -Son of a bitch!
Hey, you are working.
You-- you doing okay?
Not really. [sighs]
I still don't understand why you guys ended up fighting.
translation.zh: ‎我还是不明白最后你们为什么会吵架

translation.en: I guess once we moved in together, everything kind of fell apart.
translation.zh:
‎我想一旦我们搬到一起
‎所有的事情都会分崩离析

translation.en: Wait. So what, you're just gonna give up?
translation.zh: ‎等等 所以呢 你就这样放弃了？

translation.en: I'm not giving up.
I'm just tired of fighting.
Well, then do something about it.
Like talk to her or fight for her. Anything. God!
translation.zh:
‎比如跟她谈谈或者再去争取她
‎做什么都行 天呐！

translation.en: [Elle sobbing] Between my family and the job,
and just trying to make it up to Lee after lying about Berkeley,
translation.zh:
‎还有在伯克利的事上撒谎之后
‎只想补偿李尔

translation.en: [sniffles] I just feel like I'm running around like a crazy person.
translation.zh: ‎我觉得辗转于这些事之间我都要疯了

translation.en: As far as living with Noah in Boston goes--
translation.zh: ‎至于和诺亚一起在波士顿生活…

translation.en: [sighs, chuckles] Oh, gosh. How much time you got?
-As much time as you need. -[chuckles]
You're really sweet.
[Noah] Hey, what's wrong?
Just go away.
No, I'm not going anywhere. What's going on?
translation.zh: ‎不 我哪儿也不去 怎么回事？

translation.en: [sighs] It's my parents. They just--
They don't even wanna try and patch things up.
They just want out.
You know,
you see all the problems, and you hear all the fights,
translation.zh:
‎你看到了所有的问题
‎听到了所有的争吵

translation.en: but you still think they're gonna find a way to figure it out.
translation.zh: ‎但还是想着他们会想办法解决

translation.en: Listen, why don't I come back at the end of your shift?
translation.zh:
‎这样吧 要不
‎我在你轮班结束后再回来？

translation.en: We can keep talking.
-Really? -Sure. [chuckles]
Okay, yeah. [chuckles]
That'd be kinda nice.
[Chloe] Look at me.
I'm a 23-year-old woman, and I'm crying because Mommy and Daddy are breaking up.
translation.zh:
‎我都是个23岁的大姑娘了
‎却因为爸妈要分开在大哭

translation.en: -Stop. -[sighs]
God, I feel so pathetic right now. [sniffles]
translation.zh: ‎天啊 我感觉现在自己好可悲

translation.en: You don't have to do that.
Not with me.
Should probably get back to work. [chuckles]
Thank you.
Come here.
I'll see you later.
Sorry. We're closed.
Hello?
Hi.
May I have this dance?
Noah Flynn wants to dance?
Yeah, just this one time.
I don't like fighting.
Me either.
But I'll fight for you.
I'll fight for you too.
Hey, dude. Could you, like, not mess up that room? I just cleaned it.
translation.zh:
‎嘿 老兄 你能不能别把那房间搞乱？
‎我刚打扫过

translation.en: Your mom has buyers coming in, like, 30 minutes.
-What have you been doing all morning? -[explosions]
You're doing it wrong. Here, gimme.
translation.zh: ‎你打得不对 来 给我

translation.en: [sighs] I do not understand why you're helping her sell the house.
translation.zh: ‎我不明白你为什么 要帮她卖房子

translation.en: I'm not. I'm just taking care of it like we promised.
translation.zh:
‎我没有 我只是
‎照我们承诺的那样照料房子

translation.en: -Boom! There you go. -Whatever.
Traitor.
So what time do you wanna leave for, uh, Berkeley next week?
translation.zh: ‎你下周想什么时候去伯克利？

translation.en: -Oh. Oh, man. -Elle…
I know. I know. I know. I know, but listen.
Noah and I, like, literally just made up.
And things have been kinda off lately, so… [sighs]
translation.zh: ‎最近情况不太好 ‎我觉得我应该留下来

translation.en: I feel like I should stick around.
Sure.
-It's fine. -Thank you.
That afternoon,
I couldn't stop thinking about what I knew I needed to do.
translation.zh: ‎我都在想我心知自己需要做的那件事

translation.en: -Hi. -[Elle] Hey, Marco, um…
I just wanted to call, and-- and, um…
say sorry about last night.
Uh, Noah came by, and we, uh, sorted things out.
translation.zh: ‎诺亚来找我 然后我们和好了

translation.en: Okay.
Uh, that's-- that's great.
Yeah.
But thank you so much for being there for me.
I mean, that really meant a lot.
Yeah, of course.
And if you ever wanna talk or need anything,
translation.zh:
‎你以后要是想谈谈心
‎或者有什么需要的话

translation.en: you know, just call me.
Okay?
Day or night. I mean it.
Thank you.
Um, I'll let you get back to work.
Uh, take care.
All right, bye.
Hey, Tuppen. What's up, dude?
translation.zh: ‎喂 塔宾 你好吗 老兄？

translation.en: Great.
So what are you doing for the Fourth of July?
So I was cleaning out our room, and then it just fell out of her bag.
translation.zh:
‎我打扫我们房间的时候
‎从她的包里掉出来个东西

translation.en: So what did you find?
She had an acceptance letter to Berkeley.
translation.zh: ‎她收到了伯克利的录取通知书

translation.en: Which means that she was never on the wait-list.
translation.zh: ‎也就是说她从来没有在候补名单上

translation.en: -Wow! -I guess she found out, like, in May.
translation.zh:
‎-天呐
‎-她应该是五月就知道了

translation.en: Well, I guess that that does show how much she wants to be with you in Boston.
translation.zh:
‎我想这说明了
‎她有多想和你一起去波士顿

translation.en: Yeah, yeah, I guess.
So, look what I got us.
Oh, my God! Lee, how did you get these?
translation.zh: ‎我的天！李尔 你怎么弄到这个的？

translation.en: These are for the concert on the 22nd.
We're both in college orientation then.
translation.zh: ‎那时候我们俩都在参加大学迎新了

translation.en: Yeah, I figure we could skip orientation so that we could spend more time together.
translation.zh:
‎对 我们可以不参加迎新会
‎这样我们就能有更多的时间在一起了

translation.en: -Oh, hi, Ellen! -Ellen, how are you?
translation.zh:
‎-嗨 艾伦
‎-艾伦 你好吗？

translation.en: -Happy Fourth of July, Ellen! -[Elle] How are you?
translation.zh:
‎-国庆节快乐 亲爱的！
‎-你好吗？

translation.en: Welcome to the party.
Hey!
Oh, Randy! Okay, bye, Elle.
translation.zh: ‎兰迪！好了 再见 艾莉

translation.en: -[Olivia] I'll see you later. -Bye.
[Gwyneth] Hello, Randy!
-Hey, I hope it's okay I'm here. -Um…
Tuppen was, like, pushing me hard to tag along.
Yeah, yeah, of course. Hi.
translation.zh: ‎当然没问题了 过来就好

translation.en: -There's, you know, food and drinks… -I can't believe that Marco showed up.
translation.zh: ‎这儿有好吃的好喝的… ‎真不敢相信马可来了

translation.en: I know.
-So, have fun. -[Marco] Cool.
-Thanks. -[Elle] Yeah.
Whoa! One to one.
[man] Let's go!
All right. Whoo!
MVP, baby!
-[man] Let's go! -[man 2] Match point. All tied up.
-Good game, dude. -Good game.
-That's great. [cackles] -Yeah!
Hey, close one.
Yeah. Nice shot, asshole.
You know, you shouldn't be a sore loser.
And I'd appreciate it if you watched your mouth.
translation.zh: ‎我希望你可以注意你的言辞

translation.en: Yeah, I'm just trying to have a good time. You're the one trying to hurt somebody.
translation.zh:
‎我只是想好好玩
‎你才是想伤害别人的人

translation.en: Hmm. And what are you trying to do?
Look, this little innocent friend thing you got going on,
translation.zh: ‎听着 你所谓的纯洁友谊

translation.en: nobody's buying it.
-It's very clear what you're here for. -Really? What is that?
translation.zh:
‎-你来这儿的目的很明显
‎-是吗？什么目的？

translation.en: You still want Elle.
-You shut up. -Guys, can you please stop this?
You still want Elle, and everybody here knows that.
translation.zh: ‎你还是喜欢艾莉 大家都知道

translation.en: Yo, I said shut up.
The sooner you get that through your thick skull, the sooner you--
translation.zh:
‎你这脑子越早明白这一点
‎你就能尽早…

translation.en: -[crowd gasping] -Noah!
translation.zh:
‎你这脑子越早明白这一点
‎你就能尽早… ‎诺亚！

translation.en: I'm not doing this.
You okay?
[Elle] Noah!
Noah! Noah!
Noah, please… [panting]
Will you please say something?
I asked you not to let him back in our lives.
translation.zh:
‎我跟你说过
‎不要让他回到我们的生活中

translation.en: Wait, Noah!
Noah, wait. [sobs]
Elle! I am so sorry.
-I cannot believe that you just did that. -He-- he was pushing me.
translation.zh:
‎-我真不敢相信你打了他
‎-是他逼的

translation.en: -I didn't know what to do. -I don't care!
translation.zh:
‎-我不知道该怎么办
‎-我不在乎！

translation.en: You just-- you seriously-- you need to not be here right now.
You just need to go.
Look, Noah was right.
And you know he was.
Look, I know I've messed up a lot,
but it doesn't change how I feel about you.
translation.zh: ‎但这不会改变我对你的感情

translation.en: And I know you're not meant to be with that guy.
translation.zh: ‎我知道你注定不该和他在一起

translation.en: -No. -Please just give me a chance and I'll--
translation.zh:
‎-别说了
‎-请再给我一次机会 我会…

translation.en: Stop it. Stop it! Stop!
[sobs] You need to go. Please.
-Look what I found. [chuckles] -[Brad] Oh, Monopoly!
-[Brad] The game… -[Linda] …is on!
[Mr. Evans] Okay. Brad, you do the honors.
translation.zh: ‎好了 布莱德 你来吧

translation.en: Is that your favorite game, Brad?
translation.zh: ‎那是你最爱的游戏吗 布莱德？

translation.en: -[Brad] It is my favorite. -Oh, wow! Yes!
-[Brad] I'm gonna set up these pieces. -[Linda] This one's for you.
-He's very particular. -[laughing]
Oh, and I call the race car.
Oh, no, no, no, no. Hang on. We have to roll to pick our pieces.
translation.zh: ‎不行 慢着 我们得扔骰子才能选

translation.en: -[Mr. Evans] Play by the rules! -[Brad] Okay.
translation.zh:
‎不行 慢着 我们得扔骰子才能选 ‎-按规则玩
‎-好 她认真了

translation.en: [chuckles] She's serious.
All right, I got this. I got this.
-Yes! -Oh!
I get to choose. Whoo!
And I will choose the doggy.
Oh, no, no, actually-- sorry. I'm-- I'm always the Scottie.
translation.zh: ‎不行…抱歉 我一直用的史考提

translation.en: Come on, Elle. I rolled first.
translation.zh: ‎别这样 艾莉 我先扔骰子的

translation.en: -Come on, Elle. Come on. -I get the doggy. Right is right.
translation.zh:
‎-加油 艾莉 加油
‎-我得拿狗狗 规矩就是这样

translation.en: It doesn't matter. [chuckles]
Come on, Elle. Give her the piece.
Sure. I'm just-- yeah. I wasn't-- didn't really wanna play, anyway.
translation.zh: ‎好 我就是…反正我也不太想玩

translation.en: Oh, no, hang on. You have it. I want you to have it. Here.
translation.zh: ‎别 等一下 给你吧 我想你用这个 给

translation.en: I don't really care what you want.
-Elle! -What?
Well, I'm sorry, Dad. I'm--
She can't just, like, walk into our lives and be all part of it
translation.zh:
‎她不能就这样走进我们生活
‎然后成为一家人

translation.en: like she's just been here the whole time.
Linda, you don't belong here.
No matter how hard you're trying to.
[Mr. Evans] Elle!
What was all that?
I'm sorry, but I cannot stand her.
translation.zh: ‎对不起 但我实在受不了她

translation.en: The way that she's trying to force herself into our lives.
translation.zh: ‎她就这样强行挤进我们的生活

translation.en: -What are you talking about? -She's not Mom.
She never will be.
And I just think it's selfish of you to even be doing it.
-Selfish? -Yes.
I've spent the last six years of my life
making sure that you and Brad are my only priority.
translation.zh: ‎我都确保优先考虑你和布莱德

translation.en: I put that part of my life on hold.
translation.zh: ‎我把我自己的人生都搁置了

translation.en: I even took a job that I hate
translation.zh: ‎我还找了份我不喜欢的工作

translation.en: to earn more money to help you with school.
You stand there and you call me selfish?
-Dad, I didn't realize-- Dad, I had no-- -No, Elle. No.
translation.zh:
‎-爸爸 我不知道…我完全…
‎-别说了 艾莉

translation.en: Do you really think that you are the only person
who needs love in their life?
You have no idea how disappointed in you I am right now.
translation.zh: ‎你不知道我现在对你有多失望

translation.en: [Lee] So…
my mom told me a little secret that I think I'll let you in on.
translation.zh:
‎我妈跟我说了个小秘密
‎我想也该分享给你

translation.en: There's, uh, two things in life that are worth spending a little extra on.
translation.zh: ‎人生中有两件事值得额外多花钱

translation.en: First one is, uh, quality trash bags.
translation.zh: ‎第一个就是质量好的垃圾袋

translation.en: What's the other one?
Bacon. Obviously.
I really messed up yesterday.
Your dad will forgive you.
And Noah will come back.
He always does.
Yeah.
-Thanks for helping me clean up. -Of course.
Rule number three.
[Elle] Rule number three is a good one.
Always help clean up your bestie's messes.
translation.zh: ‎永远要收拾好朋友的烂摊子

translation.en: Um, are we still good for the arcade later?
Yeah.
I'm glad you remembered.
Of course. I wouldn't miss it.
Lee was right.
Noah would come back.
But I wondered where he was.
And then it hit me.
Hi.
Hi.
you were right about Marco.
And I'm really sorry. I didn't handle that well at all.
translation.zh: ‎我真的很抱歉 是我没有处理好

translation.en: Yeah, I guess maybe we both could've handled it differently.
translation.zh:
‎是啊 我想也许我们本都可以
‎以不同的方式处理

translation.en: Yeah.
We've been fighting a lot lately.
I mean, I guess.
But you know, I've-- I've just had so much pressure on me, and…
translation.zh:
‎但是你要知道
‎我就是最近压力太大了

translation.en: we really haven't had any alone time together.
translation.zh: ‎我们并没有太多的独处时间

translation.en: [Noah] I think maybe it's more than that.
Elle, you and I have been trying so hard.
I know.
Let's say we keep trying.
But this and then in a year's time, it doesn't work out
translation.zh: ‎但再坚持一年 也没什么结果

translation.en: and, you know, you've moved across the country. You've given up everything you wanted for me.
translation.zh:
‎你还要为此横跨全国
‎放弃你想要的一切…

translation.en: [splutters] Yeah, but that's for me to decide.
translation.zh: ‎确实 但那是我来决定的

translation.en: I-- I think-- I mean, I would think that I would know what's best for me.
translation.zh:
‎我想…我想我知道
‎什么对我来说是最好的

translation.en: No, you do. You-- you do. You definitely know what's best for you, but…
translation.zh:
‎对 你知道 你肯定清楚
‎什么对你来说是最好的

translation.en: I don't wanna be one of the people who makes you put yourself last.
translation.zh:
‎但我不想成为一个
‎让你把自己置于最后的人

translation.en: What does that mean?
Look, Elle, I don't wanna be responsible for a decision you make
translation.zh: ‎听着 艾莉 我不想你因为我

translation.en: that you're gonna regret.
-[scoffs] -Listen, now, you can reapply at Berkeley.
translation.zh:
‎不 你听我说
‎如今你可以重新申请伯克利大学

translation.en: No, you can go to school with Lee like you wanted.
translation.zh: ‎你可以如你所愿那般和李尔一起上学

translation.en: I just don't wanna be the one that kept you from being with him.
translation.zh:
‎我只是不想成为那个
‎阻止你和他在一起的人

translation.en: -It's my decision to go to Boston! -I can't be respon--
translation.zh:
‎-是我自己决定去波士顿的！
‎-我不能…

translation.en: Why do you think you get to decide these things for me?
translation.zh: ‎你凭什么觉得你有资格替我做决定？

translation.en: I'm not trying to decide anything--
Look, I know better than trying to stop you going to Boston.
translation.zh: ‎听着 我还不至于阻止你去波士顿

translation.en: But if you do decide to go…
translation.zh: ‎但如果你还是决定如此的话…

translation.en: …it's not gonna be with me.
So, that's it?
The fact that we love each other means nothing? [sobbing]
I do love you,
but maybe sometimes loving each other just isn't enough.
translation.zh: ‎但也许有时候彼此相爱是远远不够的

translation.en: Are you sure this is what you want?
translation.zh: ‎你确定这是你想要的结果吗？

translation.en: Yeah.
No, no.
Shit!
Shit.
♪ Fading, fading out… ♪
♪ Don't give up, baby ♪
Lee…
I'm so sorry.
Somehow I'll make this up to you.
That is what this entire summer was about.
Making it up to me.
Well, forget it.
I don't need it.
Please don't do this.
Elle, I have nothing more to say to you right now.
translation.zh: ‎艾莉 我现在跟你没什么好说的了

translation.en: You know that I wanted to be there.
It's just this-- this thing happened with Noah.
You seriously cannot be this upset. It is just a game, Lee.
translation.zh:
‎你没必要这么生气吧
‎就是个游戏而已啊 李尔

translation.en: Is that really what you think this is about?
The game? What, do you think I'm five?
translation.zh: ‎游戏？你怎么想的？当我五岁小孩？

translation.en: It's not just about the damn game, Elle.
translation.zh: ‎不只是因为一个破游戏 艾莉

translation.en: It's about you fighting for our friendship.
translation.zh: ‎在于你为我们的友谊而努力

translation.en: Lee, I know you're upset, but this is--
translation.zh: ‎李尔 我知道你很生气 但是…

translation.en: And I don't matter to you, really.
Not compared to him. I never have!
translation.zh: ‎跟他相比 我永远比不过他！

translation.en: You know what?
God. It's like you are five.
translation.zh: ‎天呐 你就是个五岁小孩

translation.en: You have never had to worry about anything.
You've had everything handed to you your whole life.
And now, you accuse me of not caring about you?
You know, everything that I've done this summer, everything,
translation.zh: ‎这个夏天我所做的一切 所有的一切

translation.en: for you and for everybody, just probably proves that I care too much.
translation.zh:
‎为了你 为了所有人
‎可能只是证明了我太在乎了

translation.en: This was supposed to be our best summer ever.
translation.zh: ‎这本该是我们最美好的一个夏天

translation.en: But it was never gonna be
because all of those things that just made our summer so great before, that's gone,
translation.zh:
‎因为那些曾经
‎让我们的夏天如此美好的事情 ‎都已经过去了 我们再也找不回来了

translation.en: and we're never gonna get that back.
translation.zh: ‎都已经过去了 我们再也找不回来了

translation.en: But you know what? Maybe that's the point.
translation.zh: ‎但是你知道吗？也许这就是重点

translation.en: Maybe we're not supposed to.
At least those of us who have to grow up at some point.
Oh. Oh, and-- and new rule.
Yeah, all of our rules are done.
translation.zh: ‎我们之间所有的规矩都不算数了

translation.en: ♪ If I can make your heart… ♪
translation.zh:
‎（马可
‎你没事吧？我们能聊聊吗？）

translation.en: [Marco] You can't hold on to someone.
The tighter you hold on, the more they wanna slip away.
translation.zh: ‎你抓得越紧 他们就越想溜走

translation.en: I should have taken my own advice.
I'm sorry.
[Elle] At some point in everyone's life,
translation.zh: ‎在每个人生命中的某个瞬间

translation.en: there will be a moment when you feel
there isn't a single place on earth where you actually belong.
translation.zh:
‎感觉自己完全不属于
‎这个世界上的任何地方

translation.en: This was that moment for me.
translation.zh: ‎此时此刻 我就是这个感觉

translation.en: Morning.
Hey.
I'm gonna head out, so I just wanted to say goodbye.
translation.zh: ‎我要走了 所以我想跟你道别

translation.en: How are you?
-[sighs] I don't know if you heard, but-- -Noah called me.
translation.zh:
‎-我不知道你是否听说了…
‎-诺亚给我打电话了

translation.en: [sighs] I'm really, really sorry.
Things definitely didn't turn out how I expected.
translation.zh: ‎事情的发展跟我预想的不一样

translation.en: No, for him either.
But there is one thing I know,
and that is that whether he was ready for this relationship or not,
translation.zh: ‎不论他是否准备好处理这段关系

translation.en: he really does love you.
Guess loving each other isn't always enough.
Maybe not.
Sometimes the timing just isn't right.
You take care of yourself.
You too.
For whatever it's worth…
I want you to know
that I think you are an absolutely brilliant woman.
translation.zh: ‎我认为你是位非常优秀的女性

translation.en: Thank you, Chloe.
Lee. Noah.
No, it's just me.
-Oh, hey, uh… -[Mrs. Flynn] Hey.
I didn't know you were coming today. I could've taken care of whatever you needed.
translation.zh:
‎我不知道你要来
‎我可以帮你解决你需要的东西

translation.en: No, no, no, it's fine.
I have to meet with the environmental engineers anyway.
translation.zh: ‎反正我还要和环境工程师见面

translation.en: They have to approve any shoreline demolition.
translation.zh: ‎任何海岸线的拆除都要他们的批准

translation.en: Wait. They're tearing the house down?
translation.zh: ‎等等 他们要把房子拆了？

translation.en: Putting in condos. [sighs]
[exhales] This day is just getting worse and worse.
Lee told me everything last night.
translation.zh: ‎昨晚李尔把一切都告诉我了

translation.en: [clicks tongue] Yeah.
[sighs] And, um, Noah and I are pretty much done too.
translation.zh: ‎而且我和诺亚差不多也分手了

translation.en: Elle, can I talk to you about something?
Yeah.
Other than Noah,
why did you wanna go to Harvard?
-What do you mean? It's Harvard. -Yeah.
-Why wouldn't I wanna go there? -True.
translation.zh:
‎-对…确实
‎-为什么会不想去那里？

translation.en: It's just that the whole time I've heard you talking
about where you were going to go to school,
I never once heard you talk
about what you actually wanted to study once you got there.
translation.zh: ‎你到了那里以后真正想学什么

translation.en: Yeah, I mean, like, lots of people figure out what they wanna study
once they start going to a college, though.
I know.
But did you ever stop to think that maybe your choice of school
translation.zh:
‎但是你有没有停下来想过
‎也许你选择的学校

translation.en: had more to do with what other people wanted for you
translation.zh: ‎更多的是为了别人对你的期望

translation.en: rather than what you wanted for yourself?
translation.zh: ‎而不是你自己对自己的期望？

translation.en: Maybe it's time that you think about what it is that you want to do.
translation.zh: ‎也许是时候考虑一下你想做什么了

translation.en: Figure out what your dream is, what you're passionate about
translation.zh:
‎弄清楚你的梦想是什么
‎你真正热爱的是什么

translation.en: and then choose a school based on that.
translation.zh: ‎然后根据这些来选择一所学校

translation.en: And not let anyone or anything change that.
translation.zh: ‎不要让任何人或任何事改变这一点

translation.en: Thank you.
Come here.
Now you just have to figure out what you're passionate about.
translation.zh:
‎现在你只要想清楚
‎自己热爱什么就好了

translation.en: -Is that all? -[chuckles]
[Rachel] Hey.
Hey, I'm glad you're here.
Uh, what do you think about this idea I'm working on?
It's beautiful.
Thank you.
Hey, Lee, can we talk?
translation.zh: ‎嘿 李尔 我们能谈谈吗？

translation.en: Uh, yeah, what's up?
Elle and Noah broke up.
What?
-You talked to her? -Yeah.
You should really call her.
She doesn't wanna hear from me.
Not after what I said to her.
Well, everything that's happened with Elle and Noah
got me thinking about us.
You know, I've watched them trying
to keep up their long-distance relationship,
and I saw how hard it was.
Rachel.
-If I did something, I swear I can fix it. -Lee, no, no. It's not you.
translation.zh:
‎-如果是我做错了什么 我一定会改的
‎-李尔 不 不是因为你

translation.en: School is gonna be really tough for both of us.
translation.zh: ‎上大学本来就会让我们俩很费心思

translation.en: And I just don't think that we should make it harder
translation.zh:
‎我认为我们更不该试图维持一段
‎如此遥远的恋爱

translation.en: by trying to make a relationship work from so far apart.
So you're breaking up with me?
You mean so much to me,
and I just don't want to see us end up like they did.
translation.zh: ‎我就是不想我们最后落到他们的结果

translation.en: And who knows? Maybe-- maybe if we're meant to be together,
translation.zh:
‎谁知道呢？也许如果
‎我们注中注定该在一起

translation.en: we'll find our way back to each other.
translation.zh: ‎我们会找到回到彼此身边的路

translation.en: [shudders] But I love you.
I love you too. [sobbing]
I don't mean to, but…
…I screw up a lot.
And you've done so much for me.
I would never want you to be unhappy.
And I had no right to stand in the way of you and Linda.
[voice cracks] I don't want you to be disappointed in me.
I'm not disappointed in you, Elle.
We all make mistakes.
It's what you do after that shows who you are.
translation.zh: ‎在此之后的做法才说明你的本性

translation.en: -Hey. -Hi, Linda.
What are you doing here?
Linda…
…I really just wanted to apologize for my behavior the other night.
translation.zh: ‎我想为那天晚上的行为道歉

translation.en: The Scottie dog piece,
it means a lot to me because that was the piece that my mom always picked
translation.zh: ‎对我来说意义重大 因为那是我妈妈

translation.en: when we would play Monopoly together.
translation.zh: ‎在我们一起玩大富翁时总会选的角色

translation.en: And it was--
Yeah, I know that sounds stupid. It just-- that's-- No, it doesn't sound stupid at all.
translation.zh:
‎-是 我知道这听起来很蠢
‎-不 听起来一点都不蠢

translation.en: I understand.
Thank you.
Elle…
…I would never dream of trying to replace your mother,
translation.zh: ‎我从未想过试图取代你妈妈

translation.en: but I did care about her a lot, and I have some stories that I'd love
translation.zh:
‎但我真的很在乎她 ‎如果你想听的话
‎我有一些故事想和你分享

translation.en: to share with you if you wanna hear them. [chuckles]
translation.zh:
‎如果你想听的话
‎我有一些故事想和你分享

translation.en: I would love that.
-I'll see you later. -Okay.
Bye.
♪ Something… ♪
translation.zh: ‎（发送至：诺亚 嘿 你还好吗）

translation.en: [Elle] I wanted to reach out to him, but I couldn't,
translation.zh: ‎我很想联系他 但是我不能这样做

translation.en: because if I did, I knew it would be to say goodbye.
translation.zh:
‎因为如果我联系了他
‎我知道那就是说再见了

translation.en: And I wasn't ready to say goodbye.
Not yet.
-Yes! Bam! -Oh-oh! I can do that too.
-[Brad] Wait, no! -[Linda] Okay, again.
[laughing] No! No way…
♪ I have a big dream ♪
[Elle] And just as it is every year,
in the blink of an eye, summer was gone.
And it was time for all of us to start our next adventure.
translation.zh: ‎是时候开始我们的下一个冒险了

translation.en: [sighs] I kept waiting for Noah to appear.
I was filled with an odd mixture of feelings.
translation.zh: ‎我心里充满了一种奇怪复杂的感情

translation.en: Desperately wanting to see him,
but dreading that he might actually be there.
[Marco] Looking for someone?
I have a feeling it's not me.
But like you said…
…I'm not the one.
Well, apparently, neither is Noah. So…
I'm sorry.
But I'm glad we got a chance to say goodbye before I go.
translation.zh:
‎但我很高兴在我走之前
‎我们有机会道别

translation.en: -Finally pick a school? -No.
Gap year. I'm going to New York.
I wanna try to work as a musician there.
Wait, really?
You never told me you wanted to go to New York.
translation.zh: ‎你从没告诉过我你想去纽约

translation.en: I've always wanted to go.
But besides my family, there was only one thing keeping me in LA, and…
translation.zh:
‎但除了我家人外
‎只有一件事情让我心系在洛杉矶

translation.en: and that's all over now.
Well, good luck. You're gonna kill it.
translation.zh: ‎祝你好运 你会大放异彩的

translation.en: Thanks.
It's my new moonshot.
Well, goodbye, Elle Evans.
Goodbye, MVP.
People pass through our lives.
Some of them fade into memories,
but a few become part of who you are.
translation.zh: ‎但有一些人会成为你的一部分

translation.en: [all] One, two, three. To Ellen!
-It's still Elle, but whatever. -[Gwyneth chuckles]
translation.zh: ‎还是艾莉比较好 无所谓了

translation.en: [Elle] It was hard watching all of them leave.
translation.zh: ‎看着所有人离开真的很难过

translation.en: None of them were perfect, but in their own way…
translation.zh:
‎没人是完美至极的
‎但他们每个人都以自己的方式…

translation.en: Hey. [gasps]
…each was a big part of my life.
translation.zh: ‎成为我人生很重要的一部分

translation.en: -Best of luck. -Vivian, get out of here with that.
translation.zh:
‎-祝你好运
‎-薇薇安 别矜持了

translation.en: Come here. I'm really gonna miss you.
translation.zh: ‎抱抱 我真的会很想你的

translation.en: And now, looking back…
Yeah, don't forget about me.
Get in here. [sobs]
[Elle] …I'm not ashamed to say I loved every damn one of them.
translation.zh:
‎我可以大大方方地说
‎我爱他们每一个人

translation.en: Yeah, of course.
-Bye. -Bye.
So you got accepted to Berkeley?
Yeah.
Why are you showing me this now?
Because that's what I should have done in the first place.
You were right.
You should've told me.
And you would've been okay with that?
No, probably not.
See? This is what I mean. I--
translation.zh: ‎看见没？这就是我的意思 我…

translation.en: It took me hurting both of you
to finally realize what the problem was.
I just… I care about you both so much
that I've spent my life,
you know, doing what's best for our relationships,
translation.zh: ‎都在为我们的关系做最好的打算

translation.en: but I haven't really gotten to spend much time figuring out
translation.zh: ‎但是我却没有花时间给自己去弄清楚

translation.en: what would make me happy.
What are you saying, that I don't care about your happiness?
translation.zh: ‎你在说什么？我不在乎你的幸福吗？

translation.en: No, no! It's not-- it's not really about anything that you did.
translation.zh: ‎不是！这跟你的所作所为无关

translation.en: It's holding something back so that I wouldn't hurt you,
translation.zh: ‎而是为了不伤害你 我选择压抑自己

translation.en: even if it hurt me.
